tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    schedule_id INT, 
    technician_name VARCHAR(255), 
    labor_hours INT, 
    repair_details TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE test_vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES test_vehicles(vehicle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    personnel_role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    log_details TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES maintenance_record(record_id)
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    history_description TEXT,
    history_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES test_vehicles(vehicle_id)
)
